/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in vibrant hues of red and yellow, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of the city. The buildings are adorned with signs written in Chinese characters, hinting at the bustling commercial life of the area. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
